news.title: [Feature] The power of personality
news.summary: To a birdwatcher or pet owner, it may be obvious that individual animals have distinct personalities.

news.title: [In Depth] Tracking how humans evolve in real time
news.summary: Many people think evolution requires thousands or even millions of years, but biologists know it can happen fast.

news.title: [Feature] Stranding sleuth
news.summary: Marine mammal veterinarian Frances Gulland's tireless efforts to glean tissue and knowledge from hundreds of whale, dolphin, and seal strandings around the world have made her a prominent figure among marine mammal scientists.

news.title: Our 10 favorite science news stories of 2016
news.summary: Plants that gamble. Floating creatures in the clouds of alien worlds. An ice-encased military base uncovered by climate change.
